atk-s0305a2:3_1: Satipaṭṭhānasaṁyuttassa paṭhame ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā ropite ambavane.
atk-s0305a2:3_3: Sā satthu dhammadesanaṁ sutvā pasannacittā tattha vihāraṁ kāretvā tathāgatassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a2:5_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0305a2:7_0: Sattānaṁ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi saṁkiliṭṭhacittānaṁ sattānaṁ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0305a2:7_1: Sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya,
atk-s0305a2:7_3: Dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṁ dvinnaṁ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0305a2:7_5: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0305a2:7_7: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya saṁvattati.
atk-s0305a2:7_9: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0305a2:7_11: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṁ sādheti.
atk-s0305a2:8_0: Evaṁ bhagavatā sattahi padehi ekāyanamaggassa vaṇṇo bhāsito,
atk-s0305a2:8_9: nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṁ desanaṁ uggahetabbaṁ pariyāpuṇitabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:8_12: Iti tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ussāhajananatthaṁ vaṇṇaṁ abhāsi kambalavāṇijādayo kambalādīnaṁ vaṇṇaṁ viya.
atk-s0305a2:9_6: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0305a2:9_9: satipaṭṭhānānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi taṁ suṇātha. Ko ca,
atk-s0305a2:9_12: Āharasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vutto.
atk-s0305a2:10_2: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a2:11_0: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a2:11_7: iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:12_5: Catassopi hi etā satiyo magganaṭṭhena ekattaṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a2:12_9: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṁ sādhayamānā nibbānaṁ gacchanti,
atk-s0305a2:12_10: ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi maggiyantīti tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā.
atk-s0305a2:12_11: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti.
atk-s0305a2:13_4: Ayañhi bhikkhu imaṁ kāyaṁ aniccānupassanādīnaṁ sattannaṁ anupassanānaṁ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0305a2:13_18: So taṁ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṁ pajahati,
atk-s0305a2:14_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapatīti ātāpo,
atk-s0305a2:14_6: Ayaṁ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṁ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati.
atk-s0305a2:14_7: Na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-s0305a2:14_11: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:14_12: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0305a2:14_14: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0305a2:14_16: Tasmā yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ānubhāvena taṁ sampajjati,
atk-s0305a2:14_17: tesaṁ dassanatthaṁ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:15_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ sampayogaṅgañjassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṁ dassetuṁ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:15_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0305a2:15_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0305a2:15_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṁ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a2:15_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ atthuddhāranayenetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:15_11: Tasmiṁ loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ vineyyāti evaṁ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a2:19_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a2:21_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṁ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattaanupassanānaṁ “santaṁ vā ajjhattaṁ
atk-s0305a2:21_6: vitthāro pana dīghamajjhimaṭṭhakathāsu satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:23_3: Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha abhikkantaṁ vuccati gamanaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:23_6: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṁ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:23_8: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṁ purato onamanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:23_10: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṁsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:25_4: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṁ nu me ettha gatena attho atthi,
atk-s0305a2:25_8: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a2:25_9: Mahāvihārasmiñhi dakkhiṇadvāre ṭhatvā mahācetiyaṁ olokentā tiṁsasahassabhikkhū arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu,
atk-s0305a2:26_1: mahācetiyassa samantā kucchivedikāya heṭṭhimabhāgato paṭṭhāya paññāyanaṭṭhāne yattha yattha dve pādā sakkā honti samaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ,
atk-s0305a2:26_2: tattha tattha ekapaduddhāre tiṁsatiṁsa bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsūti sakkā vatu”nti.
atk-s0305a2:26_5: There disvā tesaṁ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṁ disvā tattha paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a2:27_0: Tasmiṁ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:27_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-s0305a2:27_4: attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0305a2:27_13: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṁ kāretvā sabbarattiṁ dhammassavanaṁ kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0305a2:28_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṁ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0305a2:28_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṁ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṁ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṁ katvā
atk-s0305a2:28_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:28_6: “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṁ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā,
atk-s0305a2:28_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṁ puratthābhimukhā hutvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-s0305a2:28_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a2:28_12: Evaṁ ekaṁ asubhaṁ dvinnaṁ janānaṁ atthāya jātaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:28_13: Evaṁ sātthampi panetaṁ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṁ asappāyaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:29_0: Evaṁ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṁsakammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucikaṁ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṁ
atk-s0305a2:29_1: gocaraṁ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṁ gahetvāva gamanaṁ gocarasampajaññaṁ nāma.
atk-s0305a2:30_3: ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0305a2:31_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṁ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā paṭhamaṁ yāmaṁ majjhimayāme seyyaṁ kappetvā,
atk-s0305a2:31_2: pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṁ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṁ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a2:31_4: So sarīraparikammaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṁ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjitvā
atk-s0305a2:31_5: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:31_6: manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti,
atk-s0305a2:31_9: sopānapādamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṁ viya taṁ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ āruyha mahantaṁ cetiyaṁ ce,
atk-s0305a2:31_10: tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:31_12: tatheva padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:31_13: Cetiyaṁ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṁ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-s0305a2:31_14: So evaṁ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṁ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0305a2:31_15: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṁ pārupitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0305a2:32_0: Atha naṁ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṁ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṁ datvā yāva bhattaṁ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0305a2:32_1: tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṁ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0305a2:32_4: janasaṅgahaṇatthaṁ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0305a2:32_6: tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṁ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṁ katvā
atk-s0305a2:32_7: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṁ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0305a2:33_0: Atha naṁ puretaraṁ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0305a2:33_1: Porāṇakabhikkhū kira na “amhākaṁ upajjhāyo ācariyo”ti mukhaṁ oloketvā vattaṁ karonti,
atk-s0305a2:33_13: edisā nāma amhākaṁ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṁ guṇe kathayanto gacchati.
atk-s0305a2:34_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṁ vattapaṭipattiṁ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0305a2:34_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṁ vanditvā gorūpānaṁ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṁ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0305a2:34_5: pavisitvā yāguṁ labhitvā āsanasālaṁ gantvā pivati.
atk-s0305a2:34_6: Athassa dvittikkhattuṁ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādiṇṇakaṁ muñcitvā anupādiṇṇakaṁ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a2:34_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṁ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṁ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0305a2:34_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0305a2:34_9: āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ upaṭṭhahamānaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-s0305a2:34_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṁ pivitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṁ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā.
atk-s0305a2:34_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṁ na taṁ āsanamatthi,
atk-s0305a2:34_13: yattha yāguṁ pivitvā arahattaṁ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0305a2:35_1: sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetovinibandhabaddhacitto viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṁ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṁ
atk-s0305a2:35_2: akatvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṁsaggena saṁsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho
atk-s0305a2:35_4: Ayaṁ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0305a2:36_0: Yo panāyaṁ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto,
atk-s0305a2:36_2: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṁsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṁ katvā viharanti “āvuso,
atk-s0305a2:36_7: tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṁ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0305a2:36_10: Te evaṁ katikavattaṁ katvā bhikkhācāraṁ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti,
atk-s0305a2:36_17: ananucchavikaṁ te eta”nti attānaṁ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṁ okkamati,
atk-s0305a2:36_18: tathā asakkonto nisīdatīti so eva nayo.
atk-s0305a2:36_20: taṁ kilesaṁ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0305a2:36_23: paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaṁyeva eti ālindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0305a2:37_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-s0305a2:37_1: Manussāpi sudaṁ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṁ tathā gacchantaṁ disvā –
atk-s0305a2:37_5: So taṁ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṁ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a2:37_6: Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṁ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:37_7: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṁ āgamaṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:37_8: Tañca obhāsaṁ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero taṁ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-s0305a2:37_11: Thero vikkhepaṁ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-s0305a2:37_13: Tato “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0305a2:38_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento paṭhamaṁ tāva “bhagavato mahāpadhānaṁ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:38_2: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūretvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a2:38_3: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto gāmasamīpaṁ gantvā
atk-s0305a2:38_4: “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṁ pārupitvā kacchakarakato udakena pattaṁ dhovitvā
atk-s0305a2:38_7: “Mā me bhikkhaṁ dātuṁ vā vandituṁ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0305a2:38_8: katimī”ti divasaṁ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṁ vā pañhaṁ vā pucchito pana udakaṁ gilitvā āroceti.
atk-s0305a2:39_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-s0305a2:39_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā pavisiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:39_9: “kiṁ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṁ na sallapanti,
atk-s0305a2:39_13: Etha ne aññamaññaṁ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṁ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:39_14: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso, so āha –
atk-s0305a2:39_20: Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṁ patvā mahāpavāraṇāyaṁ visuddhipavāraṇaṁ pavāresuṁ.
atk-s0305a2:40_1: kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṁ
atk-s0305a2:40_2: gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0305a2:40_5: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0305a2:40_6: Na hi javena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṁ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0305a2:40_7: Visamabhūmibhāgapattaṁ pana udakasakaṭaṁ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0305a2:40_8: Anugharaṁ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṁ vā adātukāmaṁ vā sallakkhetuṁ tadanurūpaṁ kālaṁ āgamento bhikkhaṁ gahetvā
atk-s0305a2:40_9: antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikaronto
atk-s0305a2:40_12: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya…pe…
atk-s0305a2:40_13: bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ bhattakilamathaṁ paṭipassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:40_14: evaṁ pacchābhattaṁ purimayāmaṁ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti.
atk-s0305a2:40_15: Ayaṁ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0305a2:41_0: Imaṁ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṁ gatapaccāgatikavattaṁ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti,
atk-s0305a2:41_13: atha buddhānaṁ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti,
atk-s0305a2:41_14: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā,
atk-s0305a2:41_32: Iti imasmiṁ catukke yvāyaṁ harati paccāharati ca,
atk-s0305a2:42_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu –
atk-s0305a2:42_6: tathā asammuyhanto abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0305a2:42_7: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṁ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati.
atk-s0305a2:42_8: Tassevaṁ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a2:42_11: vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a2:43_0: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṁ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0305a2:43_5: tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṁ sandhisandhi odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya taṭataṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0305a2:48_0: Ālokitevilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṁ nāma purato pekkhanaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:48_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato anupekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a2:48_5: Iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0305a2:49_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ sātthakasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:49_1: Taṁ āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:50_3: sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṁ disaṁ āloketi ‘evaṁ me puratthimaṁ disaṁ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0305a2:50_11: sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṁ āloketi ‘evaṁ me anudisaṁ ālokayato’…pe…
atk-s0305a2:51_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0305a2:51_2: tasmā khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi attano kamaṭṭhānavaseneva kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:52_0: “Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0305a2:52_1: ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a2:52_2: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṁ akkhidalaṁ adho sīdati,
atk-s0305a2:52_5: tato cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ sādhentaṁ uppajjatī”ti evaṁ pajānanaṁ panettha asammohasampajaññaṁ nāma.
atk-s0305a2:56_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṁ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṁ sādhayamānaṁ pavattati,
atk-s0305a2:56_8: ayaṁ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṁ na hoti,
atk-s0305a2:56_11: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṁ itthī,
atk-s0305a2:57_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṁ sakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṁ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a2:57_1: taṁ pubbe uppannānaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0305a2:57_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṁ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṁ na yuttaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:57_3: evaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṁ
atk-s0305a2:58_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a2:58_1: tāni saddhiṁ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0305a2:58_4: Tattha yathā ekasmiṁ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:58_5: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0305a2:58_6: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṁ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṁ
atk-s0305a2:59_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0305a2:59_6: evametesaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a2:59_13: evametesaṁ catunnaṁ āyatanānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a2:59_20: evametesaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a2:60_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ akatvā hatthapādānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṁ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0305a2:60_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṁ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a2:60_7: Kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0305a2:61_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:61_4: Tattheko daharo hatthaṁ pasārento kāyasaṁsaggaṁ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0305a2:61_5: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṁ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0305a2:61_11: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:62_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṁ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjesi.
atk-s0305a2:62_3: sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjitthā”ti.
atk-s0305a2:62_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0305a2:62_7: idāni pana tumhehi saddhiṁ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā samiñjito,
atk-s0305a2:62_8: tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0305a2:63_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjanto vā pasārento vā natthi,
atk-s0305a2:63_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ hotīti parijānanaṁ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:64_2: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho,
atk-s0305a2:64_3: “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0305a2:65_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṁ sukhumaṁ sappāyaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:66_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṁ pārupanto natthi,
atk-s0305a2:66_6: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṁ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya.
atk-s0305a2:66_7: Tasmā neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:66_9: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṁ karonti,
atk-s0305a2:66_11: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṁ vā karonti domanassaṁ vā.
atk-s0305a2:66_12: Evamevaṁ neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:66_13: na asundaraṁ labhitvā domanassanti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:67_1: “imaṁ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṁ labhissāmī”ti evaṁ pattaggahaṇapaccayā paṭilabhitabbaatthavasena sātthakasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:67_6: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-s0305a2:67_8: pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0305a2:68_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṁ gaṇhanto natthi,
atk-s0305a2:68_7: saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:69_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāya
atk-s0305a2:69_1: anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṁ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi bhesajjāni ca upanāmenti.
atk-s0305a2:69_6: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
atk-s0305a2:69_7: Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahamatteneva ca kapālakena tesaṁ attho.
atk-s0305a2:69_8: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṁ viya cīvaraṁ,
atk-s0305a2:69_10: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṁ sallakkheti.
atk-s0305a2:70_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho attho nāma,
atk-s0305a2:71_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a2:72_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_2: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a2:72_4: Na koci kuñcikāya na yantakena hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati,
atk-s0305a2:72_5: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṁ uparidantānaṁ musalakiccasādhanaṁ heṭṭhādantānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:72_9: Taṁ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṁ kheḷaudakatemitaṁ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṁ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-s0305a2:72_10: vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_12: Paviṭṭhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ koci palālasantharaṁ katvā dhārento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_14: Ṭhitaṁ ṭhitaṁ koci uddhanaṁ katvā aggiṁ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_16: Pakkaṁ pakkaṁ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīharako nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:72_18: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca;
atk-s0305a2:72_19: pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca;
atk-s0305a2:72_23: viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:73_7: sammakkhanatoti evaṁ dasavidhaṁ paṭikūlabhāvaṁ paccavekkhaṇatopettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:74_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-s0305a2:74_1: Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṁ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-s0305a2:74_5: Karontassa pana sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a2:74_7: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṁ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-s0305a2:74_10: Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:75_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṁ karonto natthi,
atk-s0305a2:75_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a2:75_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a2:75_4: evaṁ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0305a2:75_5: So panāyaṁ evaṁ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa,
atk-s0305a2:75_8: Yathā udakatumbato purāṇaudakaṁ chaḍḍentassa neva taṁ attano hoti na paresaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:76_7: Ettha ca yo ciraṁ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a2:77_0: Yo sajjhāyaṁ vā karonto pañhaṁ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikaronto ciraṁ ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno
atk-s0305a2:77_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a2:78_0: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṁ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a2:79_0: Yo pana nipannakova sajjhāyaṁ karonto kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikaronto niddaṁ okkamitvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a2:79_2: ayaṁ sutte ca jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a2:80_1: “ayaṁ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca paṭicca cittassa ca tadanurūpaṁ payogaṁ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajāno bhāsati,
atk-s0305a2:80_2: ciraṁ vā pana kālaṁ sajjhāyaṁ katvā dhammaṁ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā parivattetvā pañhaṁ vā vissajjetvā
atk-s0305a2:80_3: aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati “bhāsitakāle uppannā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti ayaṁ
atk-s0305a2:81_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṁ dhammaṁ vā kammaṭṭhānaṁ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a2:81_5: Evamettha asammohasampajaññaṁ tassa vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a2:83_1: Tatiye evameva panidhekacceti so kira bhikkhu kammaṭṭhānaṁ kathāpetvā ito cito ca āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0305a2:83_4: Tasmāti yasmā saṁkhittena desanaṁ yācasi, tasmā.
atk-s0305a2:85_1: Catutthe dhammavinayoti dhammoti vā vinayoti vā ubhayametaṁ satthusāsanasseva nāmaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:85_4: Samāhitā ekaggacittāti upacārappanāvasena sammā ṭhapitacittā ca ekaggacittā ca.
atk-s0305a2:85_5: Imasmiṁ sutte navakabhikkhūhi ceva khīṇāsavehi ca bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā,
atk-s0305a2:87_11: attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṁ vadamānāti attho.
atk-s0305a2:87_12: Mahantaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvāti uddhanasaṇṭhānena ṭhitesu tīsu leḍḍūsu “ito sene āgacchante ito nikkhamissāmi,
atk-s0305a2:87_13: ito āgacchante ito”ti sallakkhetvā tesu ekaṁ leḍḍuṁ abhiruhitvā aṭṭhāsi avadamāno.
atk-s0305a2:87_14: Sannayhāti khurappaṁ sannayhamāno viya sannayhitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0305a2:87_15: Bahuāgato kho myāyanti “mayhaṁ atthāya ayaṁ bahutaṁ ṭhānaṁ āgato,
atk-s0305a2:87_17: idāni maṁ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā dāruguḷo viya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi,
atk-s0305a2:87_19: Uraṁ paccatāḷesīti “ekappahāreneva lāpassa sīsaṁ chinditvā gahessāmī”ti pakkhandattā vegaṁ sandhāretuṁ asakkonto tasmiṁ leḍḍusmiṁ uraṁ patāḷesi.
atk-s0305a2:87_21: Atha lāpo “diṭṭhā vata sattuno piṭṭhī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa hadaye aparāparaṁ caṅkami.
atk-s0305a2:89_3: Lepaṁ oḍḍentīti vaṭarukkhakhīrādīhi yojetvā lepaṁ karonti,
atk-s0305a2:89_4: taṁ makkaṭānaṁ dhuvagamanaṭṭhānanti sallakkhetvā rukkhasākhādīsu ṭhapenti.
atk-s0305a2:89_5: Pañcoḍḍitoti pañcasu ṭhānesu kājadaṇḍakaṁ pavesetvā gahetabbā kājasikkā viya oḍḍito.
atk-s0305a2:91_8: Bahuṁ gaṇhātīti ekaggahaṇena bahuṁ gaṇhantopi punappunaṁ gaṇhantopi bahuṁ gaṇhateva.
atk-s0305a2:91_9: Abhihārānanti sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā ukkhipitvā abhihaṭānaṁ dāyānaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:91_11: Nimittaṁ na uggaṇhātīti “imaṁ me kammaṭṭhānaṁ anulomaṁ vā gotrabhuṁ vā āhacca ṭhita”nti na jānāti,
atk-s0305a2:91_12: attano cittassa nimittaṁ gaṇhituṁ na sakkoti.
atk-s0305a2:93_1: Navame beḷuvagāmaketi vesāliyā samīpe evaṁnāmako pādagāmo atthi, tasmiṁ.
atk-s0305a2:93_3: Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā.
atk-s0305a2:93_5: Yesaṁ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū atthi,
atk-s0305a2:93_6: te tattha tattha vassaṁ upethāti attho.
atk-s0305a2:94_6: Atha nesaṁ ‘satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṁ satimattampi na adāsi.
atk-s0305a2:94_8: na evaṁ dūre vaseyyāmā’ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya.
atk-s0305a2:94_9: Vesāliyā samantā pana vassaṁ vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre āgantvā dhammaṁ suṇissanti,
atk-s0305a2:95_4: Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṁ sūpaṭṭhitaṁ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a2:95_5: Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṁ parivattanaṁ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno ca adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a2:95_7: Anapaloketvāti ajānāpetvāva ovādānusāsaniṁ adatvāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:95_11: Yena jīvitaṁ saṅkharīyati chijjamānaṁ ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati,
atk-s0305a2:95_14: Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā jīvitaṭhapanasamatthaṁ phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a2:96_0: Kiṁ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṁ na samāpajjatīti?
atk-s0305a2:96_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:96_6: Yā pana rūpasattakaṁ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti,
atk-s0305a2:96_8: Yathā nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṁ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyuḷhasevālo cirena udakaṁ ottharati,
atk-s0305a2:96_9: evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a2:96_10: Iti bhagavā taṁdivasaṁ mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavaṁ vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṁ arūpasattakañca
atk-s0305a2:96_11: niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṁ vikkhambhetvā “dasamāse mā
atk-s0305a2:96_13: samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā dasa māse na uppajjiyeva.
atk-s0305a2:97_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0305a2:97_1: Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya.
atk-s0305a2:97_4: Dhammāpi maṁ nappaṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānadhammā mayhaṁ pākaṭā na hontīti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a2:98_0: Anantaraṁ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṁ akatvā.
atk-s0305a2:98_1: “Ettakaṁ dhammaṁ parassa na desessāmī”ti hi cintento dhammaṁ abbhantaraṁ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a2:98_2: “ettakaṁ parassa desessāmī”ti cintento bāhiraṁ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:98_3: “Imassa puggalassa desessāmī”ti cintento pana puggalaṁ abbhantaraṁ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a2:98_4: “imassa na desessāmī”ti cintento puggalaṁ bāhiraṁ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:98_6: Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṁ ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a2:98_7: daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti,
atk-s0305a2:98_8: evaṁ tathāgatassa “idaṁ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭhāne kathessāmī”ti muṭṭhiṁ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṁ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:99_0: Ahaṁ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmīti vā,
atk-s0305a2:99_1: mamuddesikoti ahaṁ uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko,
atk-s0305a2:99_2: mameva uddissitvā maṁ paccāsīsamāno bhikkhusaṅgho hotu mama accayena mā vā ahosi,
atk-s0305a2:99_3: yaṁ vā taṁ vā hotūti iti vā pana yassa assāti attho.
atk-s0305a2:99_4: Na evaṁ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmaccherānaṁ vigatattā evaṁ na hoti.
atk-s0305a2:99_9: Maññeti jarasakaṭaṁ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti,
atk-s0305a2:100_0: Idāni tamatthaṁ pakāsento yasmiṁ ānanda samayetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a2:100_3: Tasmātihānandāti yasmā iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a2:100_4: tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṁ viharathāti dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:100_5: Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatā dīpaṁ viya attānaṁ dīpaṁ patiṭṭhaṁ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0305a2:100_9: Ettha ca dhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:100_15: Evaṁ sabbaṁ tamasotaṁ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda,
atk-s0305a2:100_19: sabbesaṁ tesaṁ catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṁ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0305a2:102_1: Dasame tenupasaṅkamīti tasmiṁ upassaye kammaṭṭhānakammikā bhikkhuniyo atthi,
atk-s0305a2:102_3: Uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesanti pubbavisesato aparaṁ uḷāravisesaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:103_2: Bahiddhā vā cittaṁ vikkhipatīti bahiddhā vā puthuttārammaṇe cittuppādo vikkhipati.
atk-s0305a2:103_3: Kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṁ paṇidahitabbanti evaṁ kilesapariḷāhe ca līnatte ca bahiddhāvikkhepe
atk-s0305a2:103_5: kismiñcideva pasādanīye pasādāvahe buddhādīsu aññatarasmiṁ ṭhāne kammaṭṭhānacittaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:103_6: Cittaṁ samādhiyatīti ārammaṇe sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṁ ṭhapiyati.
atk-s0305a2:103_10: Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesavitakkaṁ na vitakketi,
atk-s0305a2:103_13: Ajjhattaṁ satimā sukhamasmīti gocarajjhatte pavattāya satiyā “satimāhamasmi sukhito cā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a2:104_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa mahantaṁ ucchubhāraṁ ukkhipitvā yantasālaṁ nentassa kilantakilantakāle
atk-s0305a2:104_4: bhūmiyaṁ ṭhapetvā ucchukhaṇḍaṁ khāditvā puna ukkhipitvā gamanaṁ hoti;
atk-s0305a2:104_5: evameva arahattaṁ pāpuṇituṁ uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa kāyapariḷāhādīsu uppannesu taṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a2:104_6: buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṁ pasādetvā kammaniyaṁ katvā bhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a2:104_8: Tassa pana purisassa ucchubhāraṁ yantasālaṁ netvā pīḷetvā rasapānaṁ viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:104_9: matthakaṁ pāpetvā arahattaṁ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:105_0: Bahiddhāti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ pahāya bahi aññasmiṁ ārammaṇe.
atk-s0305a2:105_2: Atha pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānātīti ettha kammaṭṭhānavasena vā sarīravasena vā desanāvasena vā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:106_0: Tattha kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma,
atk-s0305a2:106_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā kilesapariḷāhassa vā līnattassa vā bahiddhāvikkhepassa vā
atk-s0305a2:106_3: uppajjituṁ okāsaṁ adento sudantagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassacchidde sutacchitaṁ caturassaghaṭikaṁ
atk-s0305a2:106_4: pakkhipanto viya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā atiṭṭhanto alagganto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a2:106_5: so puresaṅkhātassa kammaṭṭhānābhinivesassa pacchāsaṅkhātassa arahattassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:107_0: Sarīre pana pādaṅgulīnaṁ aggapabbāni pure nāma,
atk-s0305a2:107_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu pādaṅgulīnaṁ aggapabbaaṭṭhikesu abhinivisitvā byābhaṅgiyā yavakalāpaṁ mocento viya
atk-s0305a2:107_3: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena aṭṭhīni pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṁ uppattiṁ vāretvā
atk-s0305a2:107_5: so puresaṅkhātānaṁ aggapādaṅgulipabbānaṁ pacchāsaṅkhātassa sīsakaṭāhassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:108_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsavasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṁ
atk-s0305a2:108_3: uppattiṁ vāretvā yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṁ pāpeti.
atk-s0305a2:108_4: So puresaṅkhātānaṁ kesānaṁ pacchāsaṅkhātassa matthaluṅgassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṁkhittaṁ vimuttaṁ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a2:109_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa guḷabhāraṁ labhitvā attano gāmaṁ atiharantassa antarā aṭṭhapetvāva
atk-s0305a2:109_4: uccaṅge pakkhittāni guḷakhaṇḍādīni khādanīyāni khādantassa attano gāmeyeva otaraṇaṁ hoti,
atk-s0305a2:109_5: evameva arahattaṁ pāpuṇituṁ āraddhabhāvanassa kāyapariḷāhādīnaṁ uppattiṁ vāretvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a2:109_7: Tassa pana purisassa taṁ guḷabhāraṁ attano gāmaṁ netvā ñātīhi saddhiṁ paribhogo viya imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0305a2:109_8: kammaṭṭhānaṁ matthakaṁ pāpetvā arahattaṁ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:113_1: Dutiyavaggassa dutiye nālandāyanti nālandāti evaṁnāmake nagare,
atk-s0305a2:113_5: So bhagavato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṁ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṁ bhagavato vihāraṁ katvā niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a2:113_6: So vihāro jīvakambavanaṁ viya pāvārikambavanantveva saṅkhaṁ gato.
atk-s0305a2:114_4: Sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe arahattamaggañāṇe vā arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti,
atk-s0305a2:115_1: Ayañhi uḷārasaddo “uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī”tiādīsu madhure āgacchati.
atk-s0305a2:115_2: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṁ vacchāyano samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsāya pasaṁsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0305a2:115_7: Ekaṁso gahitoti anussavena vā ācariyaparamparāya vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena
atk-s0305a2:115_8: vā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viya
atk-s0305a2:115_12: vane unnādayantena sīhena viya uttamanādo naditoti attho.
atk-s0305a2:116_0: Kiṁnu te sāriputtāti imaṁ desanaṁ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0305a2:116_2: Ekacco hi sīhanādaṁ naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṁ dātuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a2:116_5: Yathā dhamamānaṁ aparisuddhaṁ lohaṁ jhāyitvā aṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0305a2:116_7: Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṁ dāpiyamāno dātuṁ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a2:116_11: Tena naṁ bhagavā “anuyogakkhamo aya”nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṁ imaṁ desanaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a2:117_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā.
atk-s0305a2:117_3: maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā evaṁsamādhīti attho.
atk-s0305a2:117_5: Evaṁvihārinoti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṁ dhammānaṁ gahitattā vihāro gahitopi puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhatīti ce.
atk-s0305a2:117_8: Tasmā evaṁ nirodhasamāpattivihārino te bhagavanto ahesunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a2:118_5: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṁ vikkhambhitehi nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a2:118_6: Aniccānupassanādikā satta anupassanā sayaṁ tassa tassa paccanīkavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a2:118_7: Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṁ samucchinnehi kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a2:118_8: Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena kilesānaṁ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā paṭipassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a2:118_9: Nibbānaṁ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ.
atk-s0305a2:118_10: Iti imāsaṁ pañcannaṁ vimuttīnaṁ vasena evaṁ vimuttāti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a2:119_0: Kiṁpana te sāriputta ye te bhavissantīti atītā tāva niruddhā apaṇṇattikabhāvaṁ gatā dīpasikhā viya nibbutā,
atk-s0305a2:119_1: evaṁ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṁ gate tvaṁ kathaṁ jānissasi,
atk-s0305a2:119_2: anāgatabuddhānaṁ pana guṇā kiṁ tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:120_0: Kiṁ pana tyāhaṁ sāriputta etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā,
atk-s0305a2:120_2: Tesañhi jānanaṁ apade ākāse padadassanaṁ viya hoti.
atk-s0305a2:120_6: kiṁ pana mayhaṁ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:120_7: Thero pana pucchitapucchite “no hetaṁ bhante”ti paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0305a2:121_2: Kiṁ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṁ karoti,
atk-s0305a2:121_6: Thero kira anuyoge āraddhe evaṁ aññāsi “nāyaṁ anuyogo sāvakapāramīñāṇe,
atk-s0305a2:121_7: sabbaññutaññāṇe pana ayaṁ anuyogo”ti attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṁ akatvāva aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṁ karoti.
atk-s0305a2:121_9: bhagavā mayhaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ buddhānaṁ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ natthīti.
atk-s0305a2:122_1: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṁ ñāṇe asati tayā evaṁ kathitanti vadati.
atk-s0305a2:122_2: Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṁ anugantvā uppannaṁ anumānañāṇaṁ nayaggāho vidito,
atk-s0305a2:122_3: sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva iminā ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0305a2:122_5: Yathā ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṁ vā pariyanto vā natthi,
atk-s0305a2:122_8: iminā anuttaro iminā anuttaro satthā”ti jānāti.
atk-s0305a2:123_0: Idāni taṁ nayaggāhaṁ pākaṭaṁ kātuṁ upamaṁ dassento seyyathāpi bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a2:123_1: Tattha yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā,
atk-s0305a2:123_4: Tasmā taṁ aggahetvā paccantimaṁ nagaranti āha.
atk-s0305a2:123_8: Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:123_10: Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi,
atk-s0305a2:123_11: tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa opammatthaṁ ekaṁyeva dovārikaṁ dassetuṁ “ekadvāra”nti āha.
atk-s0305a2:124_6: Cetaso upakkileseti pañcanīvaraṇā cittaṁ upakkilissanti kiliṭṭhaṁ karonti upatāpenti viheṭhenti,
atk-s0305a2:124_8: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṁ na denti,
atk-s0305a2:124_10: Supatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā hutvā.
atk-s0305a2:124_11: Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvā.
atk-s0305a2:124_12: Anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ paṭivijjhiṁsūti dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:125_6: Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero panāha “satipaṭṭhāne vipassanaṁ gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyya,
atk-s0305a2:125_8: Iti thero sabbabuddhānaṁ nīvaraṇappahāne satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṁ viya nānattābhāvaṁ dasseti.
atk-s0305a2:126_14: nagaraṁ pavisanakanikkhamanakā oḷārikapāṇā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā buddhā,
atk-s0305a2:126_15: dovārikassa tesaṁ pāṇānaṁ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṁ buddhānaṁ sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-s0305a2:126_17: “evamahaṁ sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmī”ti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0305a2:127_4: “pubbaṇhe me kathita”nti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha,

atk-s0305a2:127_6: Sā pahīyissatīti “sāriputtasadisopi nāma ñāṇajavanasampanno sāvako buddhānaṁ cittācāraṁ jānituṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a2:127_7: evaṁ appameyyā tathāgatā”ti cintentānaṁ yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā,
atk-s0305a2:129_2: Nālakagāmaketi rājagahassa avidūre attano kulasantake evaṁnāmake gāme.
atk-s0305a2:129_3: Cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṁ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko,
atk-s0305a2:129_4: taṁ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:130_1: bhagavā kira vutthavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā “sāvatthiṁ gamissāmī”ti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṁ patvā jetavanaṁ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a2:130_2: Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṁ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṁ gato,
atk-s0305a2:130_3: so tattha antevāsikesu vattaṁ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṁ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṁ paññāpetvā pāde
atk-s0305a2:130_5: Athassa yathā paricchedena tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṁ parivitakko udapādi “buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṁ parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0305a2:130_7: tato “aggasāvakā paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṁ olokesi.
atk-s0305a2:130_8: So “sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissantī”ti ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0305a2:131_2: ahaṁ kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti punappunaṁ cintento mātaraṁ ārabbha satiṁ uppādesi –
atk-s0305a2:131_3: “mayhaṁ mātā sattannaṁ arahantānaṁ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā,
atk-s0305a2:131_6: Sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṁ disvā “kassa desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati,
atk-s0305a2:131_11: Tathā hissa samacittasuttantadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṁ pattā,
atk-s0305a2:131_13: aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti,
atk-s0305a2:131_14: there ca cittaṁ pasādetvā sagge nibbattāneva asīti kulasahassāni,
atk-s0305a2:131_16: Tasmā mātaraṁ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṁ katvā “ajjeva bhagavantaṁ
atk-s0305a2:132_0: Bhikkhū senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṁ agamaṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:132_1: Thero senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṁ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṁ oloketvā “idaṁ dāni pacchimadassanaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:132_2: puna āgamanaṁ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “anujānātu me bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0305a2:132_6: Buddhā pana yasmā “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇavaṇṇaṁ saṁvaṇṇentīti,
atk-s0305a2:132_7: “mā parinibbāhī”ti vutte vaṭṭassa guṇaṁ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṁ āropessanti,
atk-s0305a2:132_16: idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṁ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṁ dullabhaṁ bhavissati,
atk-s0305a2:133_1: “satthā mayhaṁ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṁ dhammadesanaṁ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṁ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṁ
atk-s0305a2:133_2: ākāsaṁ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a2:133_3: puna dvitālappamāṇaṁ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a2:133_4: etenupāyena sattatālappamāṇaṁ abbhuggantvā anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a2:133_7: Uparimena vā heṭṭhimena vā upaḍḍhakāyena katheti adissamānenapi dissamānenapi,
atk-s0305a2:133_15: kālena mahābrahmāti evaṁ anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0305a2:133_17: Thero oruyha dasabalassa pāde vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:134_0: Thero alattakavaṇṇe hatthe pasāretvā satthu suvaṇṇakacchapasadise pāde gopphakesu gahetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0305a2:134_1: imesaṁ pādānaṁ vandanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikaṁ asaṅkhyeyyaṁ pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0305a2:134_3: ito dāni paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena na puna ekaṭṭhāne sannipāto samāgamo atthi,
atk-s0305a2:134_5: anekehi buddhasatasahassehi paviṭṭhaṁ ajaraṁ amaraṁ khemaṁ sukhaṁ sītalaṁ abhayaṁ nibbānapuraṁ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0305a2:134_6: sace me kiñci kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a2:134_11: na kho pana te kiñci kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā mayhaṁ aruccanakaṁ atthi,
atk-s0305a2:135_0: Iti bhagavatā anuññātasamanantaraṁ satthu pāde vanditvā uṭṭhitamatte āyasmante sāriputte sinerucakkavāḷahimavantaparibhaṇḍapabbate dhārayamānāpi –
atk-s0305a2:135_1: “ajja imaṁ guṇarāsiṁ dhāretuṁ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya ekappahāreneva viravamānā mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantā akampi,
atk-s0305a2:136_1: “dhammasenāpatiṁ paṭipādessāmī”ti dhammāsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukho gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:136_2: Thero tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā –
atk-s0305a2:136_3: “bhagavā ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassīsammāsambuddhassa pādamūle nipajjitvā tumhākaṁ dassanaṁ patthesiṁ,
atk-s0305a2:136_8: Puna tumhākaṁ dassanaṁ natthī”ti vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṁ añjaliṁ paggayha yāva dassanavisayā abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a2:136_9: Puna mahāpathavī dhāretuṁ asakkontī udakapariyantaṁ katvā akampi.
atk-s0305a2:137_4: Tasmiṁ khaṇe catassopi parisā sammāsambuddhaṁ ekakaṁyeva jetavane ohāya niravasesā nikkhamiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:137_7: passissāma na”nti nagaradvārāni nirokāsāni karontā nikkhamitvā gandhamālādihatthā kese vikiritvā –
atk-s0305a2:137_11: kassa hatthe satthāraṁ ṭhapetvā thero pakkanto”tiādinā nayena paridevantā rodantā theraṁ anubandhiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:138_1: “sabbesaṁ anatikkamanīyo esa maggo”ti mahājanaṁ ovaditvā – “tumhepi, āvuso,
atk-s0305a2:138_3: mā dasabale pamādaṁ āpajjitthā”ti bhikkhusaṅghampi nivattetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṁ pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a2:138_6: idaṁ idāni gamanaṁ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti paridevantā anubandhiṁsuyeva. Tepi –
atk-s0305a2:139_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sabbattha ekarattivāsena antarāmagge sattāhaṁ manussānaṁ saṅgahaṁ karonto sāyaṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_2: Atha uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṁ gacchanto theraṁ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:139_21: daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṁ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṁ
atk-s0305a2:139_22: vasanaṭṭhānaṁ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0305a2:140_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ pāsādaṁ āruyha jātovarakaṁ pavisitvā nisīdi,
atk-s0305a2:140_2: Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo ābādho uppajji,
atk-s0305a2:140_7: “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṁ na ruccatī”ti attano vasanagabbhadvāraṁ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:141_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṁ viharatī”ti olokentā nālakagāme jātovarake parinibbānamañce nipanno,
atk-s0305a2:141_8: Tesaṁ gatāvasāne teneva nayena sakko devānamindo.
atk-s0305a2:142_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṁ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṁ vanditvā gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṁ gantvā “tāta, cunda,
atk-s0305a2:142_11: amhākaṁ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā hutvā ārakkhaṁ akaṁsūti.
atk-s0305a2:142_16: amhākaṁ satthu tāvatiṁsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṁ gahetvā otiṇṇoti.
atk-s0305a2:142_17: Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotayamāno viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike,
atk-s0305a2:142_18: tuyhaṁ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti.
atk-s0305a2:142_22: ete nāma kira amhākaṁ satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṁ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṁsūti.
atk-s0305a2:143_2: kīdiso vata mayhaṁ puttassa bhagavato satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṁ phari. Thero –
atk-s0305a2:143_4: ayaṁ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā”ti cintetvā “kiṁ cintesi mahāupāsike”ti āha.
atk-s0305a2:143_6: satthu panassa kīdiso bhavissatīti idaṁ, tāta,
atk-s0305a2:143_9: mayhaṁ satthujātakkhaṇe mahābhinikkhamane sambodhiyaṁ dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0305a2:143_10: Sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:143_11: itipi so bhagavāti vitthāretvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṁyuttaṁ dhammadesanaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0305a2:144_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṁ āha –
atk-s0305a2:144_3: evarūpaṁ nāma amataṁ mayhaṁ ettakaṁ kālaṁ na adāsī”ti. Thero –
atk-s0305a2:144_4: “dinnaṁ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:145_1: “āvuso catucattālīsaṁ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṁ vicarantānaṁ yaṁ me kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a2:145_3: amhākaṁ chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṁ aruccanakaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a2:145_5: Atha thero mahācīvaraṁ saṅkaḍḍhitvā mukhaṁ pidhāya dakkhiṇena passena nipanno satthā viya nava anupubbasamāpattiyo
atk-s0305a2:145_6: anulomapaṭilomato samāpajjitvā puna paṭhamajjhānaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva catutthajjhānā samāpajji.
atk-s0305a2:145_7: Tato vuṭṭhāya anantaraṁyeva mahāpathaviṁ unnādento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0305a2:146_2: na kiñci kathetī”ti uṭṭhāya piṭṭhipāde parimajjantī parinibbutabhāvaṁ ñatvā mahāsaddaṁ kurumānā pādesu nipatitvā –
atk-s0305a2:146_3: “tāta mayaṁ ito pubbe tava guṇaṁ na jānimhā,
atk-s0305a2:146_4: idāni pana taṁ ādiṁ katvā anekasate anekasahasse anekasatasahasse bhikkhū imasmiṁ nivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojetuṁ na labhimhā,
atk-s0305a2:146_6: vihārasataṁ vihārasahassaṁ kāretuṁ na labhimhā”ti yāva aruṇuggamanā paridevi.
atk-s0305a2:146_7: Aruṇe uggatamatteyeva suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṁ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭiyo mahātulāya tulāpetvā –
atk-s0305a2:147_2: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni pañca agghikasatāni ca māpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0305a2:147_3: Iti upāsikāya kāritāni ca vissakammena nimmitāni ca sabbānipi dvesahassāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0305a2:147_4: Tato nagaramajjhe sāramayaṁ mahāmaṇḍapaṁ kāretvā maṇḍapamajjhe mahākūṭāgāraṁ ṭhapetvā sesāni parivārasaṅkhepena ṭhapetvā sādhukīḷikaṁ ārabhiṁsu.
atk-s0305a2:148_1: “ahaṁ therassa pūjaṁ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇapupphānaṁ tayo kumbhe kāresi.
atk-s0305a2:148_2: “Therassa pūjaṁ karissāmī”ti sakko devarājā aḍḍhateyyakoṭināṭakehi parivārito otari.
atk-s0305a2:148_4: Tattha sāpi upāsikā paṭikkamamānā garubhārattā ekamantaṁ apasakkituṁ asakkontī manussānaṁ antare pati.
atk-s0305a2:148_6: Sā tattheva kālaṁ katvā tāvatiṁsabhavane kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0305a2:148_7: Nibbattakkhaṇeyevassā ratanakkhandho viya tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvo ahosi saṭṭhisakaṭapūrappamāṇaalaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā accharāsahassaparivāritā.
atk-s0305a2:148_11: kiṁ nu kho me kammaṁ kata”nti cintayamānā addasa –
atk-s0305a2:148_12: “mayā sāriputtattherassa parinibbutaṭṭhāne tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi pūjā katā,
atk-s0305a2:148_15: theraṁ nissāya laddhaṁ idāni puññavipākaṁ manussānaṁ kathessāmī”ti saha vimāneneva otari.
atk-s0305a2:149_6: Tampi vimānaṁ tāvadeva āgantvā therassa dārucitakamatthake vehāsaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a2:149_7: Devadhītā vimānaṁ ākāseyeva ṭhapetvā pathaviṁ otari.
atk-s0305a2:149_11: tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi theraṁ pūjaṁ katvā manussehi madditā kālaṁ katvā tāvatiṁsabhavane nibbattā,
atk-s0305a2:149_14: puññāni karothā”ti kusalakiriyāya vaṇṇaṁ kathetvā therassa citakaṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā vanditvā attano devaṭṭhānaṁyeva gatā.
atk-s0305a2:150_0: Mahājanopi sattāhaṁ sādhukīḷikaṁ kīḷitvā sabbagandhehi citakaṁ akāsi,
atk-s0305a2:150_2: Therassa sarīraṁ citakaṁ āropetvā usīrakalāpakehi ālimpesuṁ.
atk-s0305a2:150_7: mayhaṁ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa parinibbutabhāvaṁ sammāsambuddhassa ārocessāmī”ti
atk-s0305a2:150_8: dhātuparissāvanaṁ therassa ca pattacīvaraṁ gahetvā sāvatthiṁ agamāsi.
atk-s0305a2:150_9: Ekaṭṭhānepi ca dve rattiyo avasitvā sabbattha ekarattivāseneva sāvatthiṁ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a2:150_10: Tamatthaṁ dassetuṁ atha kho cundo samaṇuddesotiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:151_0: Tattha yenāyasmā ānandoti yena attano upajjhāyo dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando,
atk-s0305a2:151_2: Kasmā panesa ujukaṁ satthu santikaṁ agantvā therassa santikaṁ agamāsīti?
atk-s0305a2:151_4: Jetavanamahāvihāre pokkharaṇiyaṁ kirassa nhatvā paccuttaritvā sunivatthasupārutassa etadahosi –
atk-s0305a2:151_7: na sakkā mayā ujukameva satthu santikaṁ gantvā kathetuṁ,
atk-s0305a2:151_11: tassa santikaṁ gantvā taṁ ādāya satthārā saddhiṁ kathessāmī”ti satthari ceva there ca gāravena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0305a2:155_4: rattiṁ nava vāreti ekāhaṁ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0305a2:155_5: Divasassa pana satavāraṁ vā sahassavāraṁ vā gantukāmo samānopi na akāraṇā gacchati,
atk-s0305a2:155_7: So taṁdivasaṁ tena kathāpābhatena gantukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:156_0: Satthā hatthaṁ pasāretvā dhātuparissāvanaṁ gahetvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “yo so,
atk-s0305a2:156_2: bhikkhu purimadivase anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni katvā parinibbānaṁ anujānāpesi,
atk-s0305a2:156_3: tassa idāni imā saṅkhavaṇṇasannibhā dhātuyova paññāyanti,
atk-s0305a2:156_6: mayā pavattitaṁ dhammacakkaṁ anupavattako esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a2:156_9: ṭhapetvā maṁ dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu paññāya asadiso esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a2:156_11: puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a2:156_13: santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṁsaṭṭho āraddhavīriyo codako pāpagarahī esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a2:156_14: pañca jātisatāni paṭiladdhamahāsampattiyo pahāya pabbajito esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0305a2:156_21: puthupaññassa hāsapaññassa javanapaññassa tikkhapaññassa nibbedhikapaññassa appicchassa santuṭṭhassa pavivittassa asaṁsaṭṭhassa āraddhavīriyassa,
atk-s0305a2:173_0: Iti bhagavā pañcahi gāthāsatehi therassa vaṇṇaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0305a2:173_1: Yathā yathā bhagavā therassa vaṇṇaṁ kathesi,
atk-s0305a2:173_2: tathā tathā ānandatthero sandhāretuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a2:173_8: Tassa hi uddesaparipucchādhamme agahite vā gahetuṁ,
atk-s0305a2:173_9: gahite vā sajjhāyaṁ kātuṁ cittaṁ na pavattati.
atk-s0305a2:173_10: Atha satthā pañcapasādavicitrāni akkhīni ummīletvā theraṁ olokento “assāsessāmi na”nti assāsento kiṁ nu kho te, ānanda,
atk-s0305a2:174_8: Sandassakoti khandhadhātuāyatanavasena tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ dassetā.
atk-s0305a2:175_0: Akilāsu dhammadesanāyāti dhammadesanaṁ ārabhitvā “sīsaṁ vā me rujjati,
atk-s0305a2:175_1: hadayaṁ vā kucchi vā piṭṭhi vā”ti evaṁ osakkanākāravirahito nikkilāsu visārado ekassāpi dvinnampi sīhavegeneva pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a2:175_2: Anuggāhako sabrahmacārīnanti padassa attho khandhakavagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0305a2:176_0: Satthā “ativiya ayaṁ bhikkhu kilamatī”ti puna taṁ assāsento nanu taṁ, ānanda,
atk-s0305a2:176_2: Tattha piyehi manāpehīti mātāpitābhātābhaginīādikehi jātiyā nānābhāvo,
atk-s0305a2:176_8: tasmā dasa pāramiyo pūretvāpi sambodhiṁ patvāpi dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvāpi yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ dassetvāpi
atk-s0305a2:176_9: devorohanaṁ katvāpi yaṁ taṁ jātaṁ bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ palokadhammaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:176_10: taṁ tathāgatassāpi sarīraṁ mā palujjīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati,
atk-s0305a2:176_11: rodantenapi kandantenapi na sakkā taṁ kāraṇaṁ laddhunti.
atk-s0305a2:177_0: Evameva khoti ettha yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho tassa dakkhiṇadisaṁ gato paññāsayojaniko mahākhandho viya dhammasenāpati.
atk-s0305a2:177_1: Tasmiṁ mahākhandhe bhinne tato paṭṭhāya anupubbena vaḍḍhitvā pupphaphalādīhi taṁ ṭhānaṁ pūretuṁ samatthassa
atk-s0305a2:177_2: aññassa khandhassa abhāvo viya there parinibbute soḷasannaṁ paññānaṁ matthakaṁ pattassa aññassa dakkhiṇāsane
atk-s0305a2:177_4: Tāya paribhinnāya so rukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho khandhotveva jātoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:177_6: taṁ mā palujjīti na sakkā laddhuṁ, tasmā.
atk-s0305a2:179_1: Catutthe aciraparinibbutesu sāriputtamoggallānesūti naciraparinibbutesu dvīsu aggasāvakesu.
atk-s0305a2:179_4: Satthā dvīsu aggasāvakesu parinibbutesu mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro mahāmaṇḍale cārikaṁ caramāno anupubbena
atk-s0305a2:179_5: ukkacelanagaraṁ patvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā gaṅgāpiṭṭhe rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇavālikāpuline vihāsi.
atk-s0305a2:179_7: Ye mahantatarā khandhā te palujjeyyunti idhāpi yojanasatubbedho mahājamburukkho viya bhikkhusaṅgho,
atk-s0305a2:179_8: tassa dakkhiṇato ca uttarato ca gatā paṇṇāsayojanikā dve mahākhandhā viya dve aggasāvakāti.
atk-s0305a2:181_0: 382. Chaṭṭhe maccudheyyassa pāranti tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pārabhūtaṁ, nibbānaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:183_1: Aṭṭhame kāye vā bhikkhūti tasmiṁ kāle bhikkhuyeva natthi,
atk-s0305a2:183_5: Jātikkhayantadassīti jātiyā khayoti ca antoti ca nibbānaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:183_7: Maggaṁ pajānātīti ekāyanasaṅkhātaṁ ekamaggabhūtaṁ maggaṁ pajānāti.
atk-s0305a2:185_4: ahaṁ taṁ rakkhissāmīti ettha ayaṁ tassa laddhi –
atk-s0305a2:185_7: sabbakālañca vaṁsaggaṁ anullokento antevāsikaṁ na rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:185_8: evaṁ arakkhito antevāsiko patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:185_11: sabbakālañca vaṁsaggaṁ ullokento taṁ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a2:185_12: Antevāsikopi ito cito ca pakkhanditvā migo viya kīḷanto ācariyaṁ na rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a2:185_13: Evañhi sati tikhiṇavaṁsakoṭi ācariyassa galavāṭake vā nalāṭe vā ṭhapitā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṁ bhinditvā gaccheyya.
atk-s0305a2:185_15: tato anāmento taṁ ākaḍḍhento viya ekatobhāgiyaṁ katvā vātūpathambhaṁ gāhāpetvā satiṁ sūpaṭṭhitaṁ katvā niccalova nisīdanto ācariyaṁ rakkhati nāmāti.
atk-s0305a2:186_7: Antevāsikopi kāyampi ekatobhāgiyaṁ katvā vātūpathambhaṁ gāhāpetvā satiṁ sūpaṭṭhitaṁ katvā niccalova nisīdamāno attānaṁyeva rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0305a2:187_0: So tattha ñāyoti yaṁ medakathālikā āha.
atk-s0305a2:187_6: attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhatīti yo bhikkhu kammārāmatādīni pahāya rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ āsevanto bhāvento arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a2:187_9: sammāpaṭipanno”ti tasmiṁ cittaṁ pasādetvā saggaparāyaṇo hoti.
atk-s0305a2:187_10: Ayaṁ attānaṁ rakkhanto paraṁ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a2:188_5: Paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ rakkhatīti ettha yo bhikkhu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṁ gato tīsu brahmavihāresu tikacatukkajjhānāni
atk-s0305a2:188_6: nibbattetvā jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a2:188_7: Ayaṁ paraṁ rakkhanto attānaṁ rakkhati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a2:190_1: Dasame janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
atk-s0305a2:190_12: vayakalyāṇanti imehi pana kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇehi samannāgatā nāma.
atk-s0305a2:190_18: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṁ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṁ hoti,
atk-s0305a2:190_20: Vīsati pana nakhapattāni maṁsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya,
atk-s0305a2:190_23: Dvattiṁsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti,
atk-s0305a2:190_25: Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nippalitā,
atk-s0305a2:191_5: Nacce ca gīte ca uttamapavatti seṭṭhakiriyā,
atk-s0305a2:191_9: Imesu pana dvīsu suttesu pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitāti.
atk-s0305a2:197_1: Tatiye parihānaṁ hotīti puggalavasena parihānaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:197_2: Yo hi buddhesu dharantesupi cattāro satipaṭṭhāne na bhāveti,
atk-s0305a2:197_3: tassa saddhammo antarahito nāma hoti devadattādīnaṁ viya.
atk-s0305a2:197_4: Iti imasmiṁ sutte tassa puggalasseva dhammantaradhānaṁ kathitaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:199_2: Cattāro hi magge tīṇi ca phalāni nibbattentena satipaṭṭhānā padesaṁ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a2:201_2: Arahattaphalaṁ uppādentena hi satipaṭṭhānā samattaṁ bhāvitā nāma honti.
atk-s0305a2:203_1: Aṭṭhame mahābhiññatanti channaṁ abhiññānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:203_3: Thero kira pātova uṭṭhāya mukhaṁ dhovitvā senāsane nisinno atīte kappasahassaṁ,
atk-s0305a2:203_5: paccuppannepi sahassaṁ cakkavāḷānaṁ tassāvajjanassa gatiṁ anubandhati.
atk-s0305a2:203_6: Iti so dibbena cakkhunā sahassaṁ lokaṁ abhijānāti,
atk-s0305a2:206_1: Catutthavaggassa pañcame viditā vedanāti yā vedanā sammasitvā arahattaṁ patto tāvassa viditā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a2:206_4: Yā ca pana pariggahitesu vatthārammaṇesu pavattā vedanā,
atk-s0305a2:210_1: Pañcamavaggassa dutiye āhārasamudayā kāyassa samudayoti āhārasamudayena kāyasamudayo.
atk-s0305a2:210_3: Manasikārasamudayāti ettha pana yonisomanasikārasamudayā bojjhaṅgadhammānaṁ samudayo,
atk-s0305a2:212_0: 410. Catutthaṁ suddhikaṁ katvā samudaye kathite bujjhanakānaṁ ajjhāsayena vuttaṁ.
atk-s0305a2:214_1: Chaṭṭhe pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutoti catunnaṁ sīlānaṁ jeṭṭhakasīlaṁ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0305a2:214_4: itarāni tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṁ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0305a2:214_15: sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhitumpi sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0305a2:215_0: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0305a2:215_5: Sikkhassu sikkhāpadesūti sikkhāpadesu taṁ taṁ sikkhāpadaṁ samādiyitvā sikkha,
atk-s0305a2:215_6: yaṁ yaṁ pana kiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṁ kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā,
atk-s0305a2:215_7: taṁ taṁ sabbaṁ sammā ādāya sikkhassūti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a2:217_2: manosucaritaṁ itarāni tīṇi sīlānīti catupārisuddhisīlaṁ kathitaṁ hoti.
atk-s0305a2:217_3: Iminā nayena pañcasattanavadasasu kusalakammapathesu pacchimāpi tayo sīlaṁ hotīti veditabbā.
